perturbation.original_text:
1. EXTENSION OF SERVICE AGREEMENT. Subject to all other terms and conditions set forth herein, as of the date of this agreement, LEADER
maintain the software for an additional five years.
perturbation.changed_text:
1. EXTENSION OF SERVICE AGREEMENT. Subject to all other terms and conditions set forth herein, as of the date of this agreement, LEADER
may maintain the software for an additional five years.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that LEADER 'maintain' the software implying a mandatory obligation. The changed text uses 'may maintain,' which introduces ambiguity and makes the maintenance optional, contradicting the initial intent of a service agreement.

perturbation.original_text:
2. COMPENSATION TO LEADER. The compensation to LEADER shall be: 3,000,000 shares of EZJR’s unregistered restricted common stock which
shall be issuable upon the closing;
perturbation.changed_text:
2. COMPENSATION TO LEADER. The compensation to LEADER may be: 3,000,000 shares of EZJR’s unregistered restricted common stock which
may be issuable upon the closing; However, EZJR reserves the right to offer an alternative form of compensation at its sole discretion.
perturbation.explanation: The original text definitively states the compensation LEADER 'shall be' shares. The modification changes 'shall be' to 'may be' and adds the possibility of an 'alternative form of compensation,' giving EZJR discretion and contradicting the original fixed compensation.

perturbation.original_text:
11. ATTORNEYS’ FEES. Each party will pay its or his own legal fees and other expenses in connection with the preparation of this Agreement and
the sale of Assets in accordance with this Agreement. However, if any legal action or other proceeding is brought for the enforcement of this
Agreement, or because or arising out of an alleged dispute, breach, default or misrepresentation in connection with any of the provisions of this
Agreement, the prevailing party will be entitled to recover reasonable attorney’s fees and other costs incurred in that action or proceeding, in
addition to any other relief to which it or he may be entitled.
perturbation.changed_text:
11. ATTORNEYS’ FEES. Each party will pay its or his own legal fees and other expenses in connection with the preparation of this Agreement and
the sale of Assets in accordance with this Agreement. However, if any legal action or other proceeding is brought for the enforcement of this
Agreement, or because or arising out of an alleged dispute, breach, default or misrepresentation in connection with any of the provisions of this
Agreement, the court, at its discretion, may order the prevailing party will be entitled to recover reasonable attorney’s fees and other costs incurred in that action or proceeding, in
addition to any other relief to which it or he may be entitled.
perturbation.explanation: Originally, the prevailing party 'will be entitled' to recover attorney's fees in a legal dispute, implying a guaranteed right. The modified text adds that 'the court, at its discretion, may order' the recovery of attorney's fees, making it discretionary and contradicting the original guarantee. This introduces uncertainty about recovering legal costs.
